overview: Stage registration of the performance by Dutch writers/journalists/media personalities Marcel van Roosmalen and Gijs Groenteman. Ten years ago, Marcel and Gijs saw no future in journalism. They bought a 'pancake caravan' and became food truck entrepreneurs. In this theatreshow they tell their story of friendship, ambition and hope, in their trademark cynical, deadpan style.
title: De Pannekoekencaravan
